source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_SEQ_00<tab>Ponnixia fears for the safety of the forest.
target: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_SEQ_00<tab>シルフの仮宿のポニシアは、悪い子シルフたちの企みに困っているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_SEQ_01<tab>Explosives strewn about Larkscall by the malevolent sylphs of the Sylphlands threaten the safety of all who call the forest home, and only the formidable team of adventurer and goobbue can set things right. Speak to the amiable sylph in Larkscall and mount the great beast.
target: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_SEQ_01<tab>悪い子シルフは、吊り橋を爆破しようとしているらしい。グゥーブーのくしゃみを使って、悪い子シルフたちの用意した爆弾を破壊するよう依頼された。ラークスコールの入口にいる「気さくなシルフ」に話しかけて、グゥーブーに騎乗しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_SEQ_02<tab>Few experiences are as exhilarating as a romp through the forest on goobbueback. But this is no time for idle recreation─employ the goobbue's sneeze to fling the sylphmade bombs into oblivion.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_SEQ_02グゥーブーに騎乗した状態で、シルフ領にある2つの「」にグゥーブーの「くしゃみ」を使おう。

※ラークスコールの「気さくなシルフ」に話しかけると「グゥーブー」に騎乗できます。

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_SEQ_03<tab>Thanks to the efforts of you and your oversized friend, Larkscall is safe once more. Inform Ponnixia that all is well.
target: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_SEQ_03<tab>グゥーブーのくしゃみで、<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E913101 /var>を破壊した。シルフの仮宿の「ポニシア」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_SEQ_04<tab>Ponnixia is deeply grateful for your efforts on behalf of her people. She also envies your goobbue ride, expressing a desire to visit Larkscall in the near future so she might enjoy the same.
target: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_SEQ_04<tab>ポニシアに報告した。ポニシアは、冒険者とグゥーブーの活躍に大満足したようだ。またの機会に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the amiable sylph in Larkscall and mount the goobbue.
target: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_TODO_00<tab>ラークスコールの気さくなシルフと話し、グゥーブーに騎乗

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_TODO_01<tab>Use your mount's Big Sneeze to destroy the bombs scattered about the Sylphlands.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_TODO_01グゥーブーに騎乗しシルフ領のにくしゃみをして
破壊する
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_TODO_02<tab>シルフの仮宿のポニシアに報告

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_PONNIXIA_000_000<tab>Touched ones grow more dangerous by the day! What are these ones to do?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_PONNIXIA_000_000冒険者さん、聞いてほしいでふっち！
悪い子シルフのやつらが、
かなりダイタンなことを企んでるようなのでふっち。

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_PONNIXIA_000_001<tab>This one saw touched ones setting blast-bombs in Larkscall! Can friendly one believe it?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_PONNIXIA_000_001やつら、仮宿とラークスコールをつなぐ吊り橋を、
どこからかもってきた「バクダン」で
「バクハ」しようとしてるみたいなのでふっち。

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_PONNIXIA_001_002<tab>In seeking to protect the forest, touched ones only destroy it. This one weeps.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_PONNIXIA_001_002そんなことになったら、
わたぴらは、ラークスコールにいけなくなって、
悪い子シルフに土地を奪われてしまうでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_PONNIXIA_001_003<tab>But tears will not save these ones' home. These ones must turn to our friends, mossy ones. Brave one is also friend to mossy ones, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_PONNIXIA_001_003そこで、わたぴたちの「オトモダチ」の出番でふっち！
グゥーブーちゃんのくしゃみのイリョクは、
「バクダン」なんて、メじゃないでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_PONNIXIA_001_004<tab>Mossy ones' <var 1A 02 /var>ka-choo<var 1A 01 /var> will blow touched ones' blast-bombs away. Amiable one in Larkscall knows friendly mossy one with big <var 1A 02 /var>ka-choo<var 1A 01 /var>. Brave one will make friends with that one, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_PONNIXIA_001_004「気さくなシルフ」からグゥーブーを借りて、
悪い子シルフがシルフ領に用意した
「」を、ふきとばちてほしいでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_PONNIXIA_000_005<tab>Mossy ones' <var 1A 02 /var>ka-choo<var 1A 01 /var> will blow touched ones' blast-bombs away. Amiable one in Larkscall knows friendly mossy one with big <var 1A 02 /var>ka-choo<var 1A 01 /var>. Brave one will make friends with that one, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_PONNIXIA_000_005「気さくなシルフ」からグゥーブーを借りて、
悪い子シルフがシルフ領に用意した
「」を、ふきとばちてほしいでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_NYXIA_000_010<tab>Ah, has friendly one come back to play with mossy one? Both ones are glad, this one and mossy one.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_NYXIA_000_010わたくぴのかわいい「オトモダチ」の
グゥーブーちゃんに乗りたいのでふっち？

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_NYXIA_000_011<tab>Touched ones have brought blast-bombs!? How frightful! Friendly one must be careful.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_NYXIA_000_011グゥーブーちゃんの「くしゃみ」で、
「」を、ふきとばちてほしいでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_NYXIA_000_012<tab>If walking one falls from mossy one, walking one should return to this one. Walking one will be riding one again.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_NYXIA_000_012もし、グゥーブーちゃんから降りたときは、
もういちど、わたくぴに話しかけるのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_NYXIA_000_015<tab>Ah, has friendly one come back to play with mossy one? Both ones are glad, this one and mossy one.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_NYXIA_000_015わたくぴのかわいい「オトモダチ」の
グゥーブーちゃんに乗りたいのでふっち？

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_NYXIA_000_016<tab>Touched ones have brought blast-bombs!? How frightful! Please be careful, friendly one. This one could not bear to see this one's friend hurt.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_NYXIA_000_016グゥーブーちゃんの「くしゃみ」で、
「」を、ふきとばちてほしいでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_NYXIA_000_030<tab>(-Amiable Sylph-)Mossy one may look scary, but mossy one has gentle heart...until mossy one sees some one hurt mossy one's home. Then mossy one gets angry. Trust this one─no one wants to see mossy one angry.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_NYXIA_000_030(-気さくなシルフ-)わたくぴのグゥーブーちゃん、
ミルクルートみたいなニオイで、かわいいでふっち？
ポニシアに、おしえてあげるのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_SYLPHENEMY_000_050<tab>These ones have angered mossy one! These ones must flee!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_SYLPHENEMY_000_050ふっちっちー！？
わたぴらまで飛ばされちゃうでふっち！
逃げるでふっちー！

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_SYLPHENEMY_000_051<tab>Our blast-bombs! Meddling one will pay for this!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_SYLPHENEMY_000_051ふ、ふっちー！！
用意した「バクダン」が台無しでふっち！
くやぴいけど、ここは退散でふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_PONNIXIA_000_040<tab>Brave one and mossy one <var 1A 02 /var>ka-choo<var 1A 01 /var>ed the blast-bombs out of Larkscall? Brave one is a true friend to the forest.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_PONNIXIA_000_040悪い子シルフの「バクダン」を、
ふきとばしてくれたのでふっち！？
吊り橋が落とされなくて、良かったでふっち～！

source: TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_PONNIXIA_000_041<tab>This one misses playing with mossy one. Perhaps next time, this one will go oneself!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL205_01271_PONNIXIA_000_041あたぴらの「オトモダチ」は、とても頼もしいでふっち。
これからも一緒に、この森を守っていくでふっち！
ありがとうでふっち！
